urls.title: Notifiable diseases and causative organisms: how to report
urls.description: Notifications of infectious diseases (NOIDs) and reportable causative organisms: legal duties of laboratories and medical practitioners.

text: @MPSHackney PM negligent- knowing Covid19-lethal pathogen is listed alongside Smallpox, Rabies and many other deadly infections https://t.co/uWHGoOiWvY , requiring stringent infection prevention control as enshirned in law, to protect UK citizens. save lives https://t.co/wKOrI0RgE6 Ask him!

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
